name: The Devil's Great Mistake
description:
The Devil's Great Mistake was made in 48hrs for the MistTree gamejam against 4 other developers.

Video on the creation of the game coming soon on my youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvqu8XVwCLHFOlJdP2SgKmg

If you get stuck on your playthrough please have a look at this guide
